rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0001
rows.name:
It's been all dark news lately,
but there was some bright news, too.

rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0002
rows.name: They said Lilio and the others are in Avaritia!

rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Dad said he'll take me there once
things in Alst settle down...

rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I never thought I'd get to see my friends
from Iraada Village again, so I'm really
looking forward to it.
